title: Fix chat-tools.ts integration with WorkspaceDevlogManager
description: Fix the chat-tools.ts integration with WorkspaceDevlogManager. The chat functionality exists in the core package but isn't properly exposed through the workspace manager layer. Need to either integrate chat methods into WorkspaceDevlogManager or create a different architecture for chat tools.

context.businessContext: User wants to use chat history import and management tools through MCP interface. The chat-tools.ts file was recreated but doesn't work because chat methods aren't exposed through WorkspaceDevlogManager.
context.technicalContext: Chat services exist in core/services but WorkspaceDevlogManager doesn't expose methods like getChatImportService, getChatSession, listChatSessions, etc. Either need to add these methods to WorkspaceDevlogManager or access services directly in chat-tools.ts.
